name: Mostly Realistic Olympic Rock Climbing
description:
Mostly Realistic Olympic Rock Climbing

This is the very first game jam me and my friend did! The game Jam was the Weekly Game Jam #151  https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-151/entries. The theme was "The Olympics", so we made a "realistic" funny physics based game with special controls, in which you need to climb rocks. We didn't even know rock climbing was an Olympic sport! Hope you guys like it.

Controls :

Q to lift left arm, W to lower left arm

A to lift left leg, S  to lower left leg

I to lift right arm, O to lower right arm

K to right left leg, L to lift lower right leg

Space to Jump

Hold any Q, W A, S, I, O, K, L for 2 sec to stop grabbing the rock with the body linked to the key!
